00038 template <typename P1 = void,
00039           typename P2 = void,
00040           typename P3 = void>
00041 class kernel {
00042         public:
00047                 kernel(kernel_pointer f);
00048 
00055                 kernel(kernel_pointer p, dim3 grid_dim, dim3 block_dim);
00056 
00057 
00062                 void set_grid_dim(dim3 grid_dim);

00068                 void set_block_dim(dim3 block_dim);

00076

00080

00082 
00083         private:
00084                 template <typename T>
00085                 void put_argument_on_stack(T a);
00086         
00087         private:        
00088                 typedef typename FunctionPtrT<void, P1, P2, P3>::Type kernel_pointer;
00089                 kernel_pointer kernel_;
00090 
00091                 dim3 block_dim;
00092                 dim3 grid_dim;
00093 
00094                 size_t stack_size_;

00097 
00098                 kernel(kernel_pointer p, const char* n) : kernel_(p), stack_size_(0), name_(n) {
00099                         block_dim.x = 1;
00100                         block_dim.y = 1;
00101                         block_dim.z = 1;
00102                         grid_dim.x =1;
00103                         grid_dim.y =1;
00104                         grid_dim.z =1;
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 void operator()() {
00108                         typename FunctionPtrT<void, void, void, void>::Type x = kernel_;
00109 
00110                         // TODO check for errors and throw an exception....
00111                         cudaConfigureCall(grid_dim, block_dim);
00112                         cudaLaunch(name_);
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 void operator()(typename ForwardParamT<P1>::Type a1) {
00116                         typename FunctionPtrT<void, P1, void, void>::Type x = kernel_;
00117                         
00118                         cudaConfigureCall(grid_dim, block_dim);
00119 
00120                         put_argument_on_stack(a1);
00121                         
00122                         if (cudaLaunch(name_) != cudaSuccess) {
00123                                 cerr << cudaGetErrorString(cudaGetLastError()) << ", " << (const char*)kernel_ << endl;
00124                         };
00125                 }
00126                 
00127                 kernel(kernel_pointer p, const char * n, dim3 block_, dim3 grid_) : kernel_(p), block_dim(block_), grid_dim(grid_), stack_size_(0), name_(n) { }
00128 
00129                 template <typename T>
00130                 void put_argument_on_stack(T a) {
00131                         if (stack_size_+sizeof(T) > 256) {
00132                                 // TODO recheck the 256
00133                                 // TODO throw an exception
00134                                 // TODO maybe we can do this check at compiletime? some more template magic...
00135                         }
00136                         if (cudaSetupArgument(&a, sizeof(T), stack_size_) != cudaSuccess) {
00137                                 cerr << cudaGetErrorString(cudaGetLastError()) << endl;
00138                         };
00139                         stack_size_+=sizeof(T);
00140                 }
00141 
00142 
00143 }
